p: For each experiment, we calculated rates of evolutionary change in haldanes and Darwins for traits that showed significant year effects, i.e., for every trait in Figs 1â€“ 3 with a significant main or interaction effect of year (Hendry and Kinnison 1999). In cases where the main effect of year was significant, we calculated evolutionary rates for phenotypes expressed in both treatments in that experiment; in cases where the effect of year was significant only within a particular treatment, we calculated rates only for phenotypes expressed in that treatment.
